roleset.name: ahed says 'fascinate by hypnosis'
roleset.note: HYPNOTIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hypnotize' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 31.1, which seems right odd to me. (from hypnotize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: you are getting very sleepy
example.text: And, if still conscious at the evening's end, you notice something else: The audience, at first entranced and hypnotized by the music, releases its pent-up feelings in collective gratitude.
